entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Barrhead 04:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %

Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
